page.title: 10Roller Skating in Haddenham
page.content: {Elm Park Roller Skating Club}is in the Haddenham Village Hall. The hall has a strong maple floor and{people from {miles around come to skate there.}One lady has been skating in Haddenham since 1950, and her{aunt used to skate {there in 1902! It costs{25p to get in,}and another {15p to hire skates.}The club opens at 5 o'clock. The first group finishes at 6 o'clock, then the next group finishes at 7.30. The adults group starts at 7.30 and finishes at half past ten. Everyone has good fun.
